summary:
How is Captain Marvel going to defeat Thanos?
Easy. She got her powers from the core explosion.
You know the core that was being...
body:
How is Captain Marvel going to defeat Thanos?

Easy. She got her powers from the core explosion.

You know the core that was being powered by the tesseract

Also known as the space stone

Carol has the power of an infinity stone

summary: Dear God, I said I wouldn’t and I was pulling back from speculations for Avengers: Endgame, but damnit, I read about the scene...
body:
Dear God, I said I wouldn’t and I was pulling back from speculations for Avengers: Endgame, but damnit, I read about the scene previewed for the Disney Shareholders and I came up with a whole new theory for Captain America’s fate.

I typed it up last night, but my question is, does anybody want to read it?

I think it’s interesting and a new possibility I haven’t seen yet, but I would love some feedback.

Please know, that if I do post it, I will put it under ‘Read More’ and tag it with spoilers so if you don’t want to read it or be spoiled, you won’t be.

So what do you guys think? Want to read a new theory or should I just keep it in my back pocket until next month?

summary: Avengers: Endgame, i fratelli Russo hanno finito il montaggio del film
title: Avengers: Endgame, i fratelli Russo hanno finito il montaggio del film
body:
Avengers: Endgame, i fratelli Russo hanno finito il montaggio del film

In Avengers: Infinity War c’era non poca carne al fuoco, con circa 30 personaggi da gestire in una pellicola di due ore e mezza, eppure i fratelli Russo, che sono tornati alla regia anche del sequel Avengers: Endgame, sono riusciti a gestire (più o meno) il tutto nel migliore dei modi. Ora però devono dimostrare di esser stati in grado di gestire anche l’enorme sfida del quarto film dedicato ai…

summary: Oh Captain! My Captain? Marvel's Cinematic Universe re-begins in Captain Marvel (2019)
title: Oh Captain! My Captain? Marvel's Cinematic Universe re-begins in Captain Marvel (2019)
body:
Oh Captain! My Captain? Marvel’s Cinematic Universe re-begins in Captain Marvel (2019) #Review

Pity poor Marvel. Their greatest enemy isn’t Thanos, or the Red Skull, or Loki. It’s not even the whiny bitter minority who somehow take offence at the very idea of a female superhero, or at least one that hasn’t been Zack Synder-approved. No, their mortal foe is Kano and with every passing movie, his model grows stronger. They’re a victim of their own success, a track record of over twenty…

summary: Listen,,,, I know Far From Home is supposed to be a feel-good movie after whatever the hell Endgame will bring, but Peter Parker...
body:
Listen,,,, I know Far From Home is supposed to be a feel-good movie after whatever the hell Endgame will bring, but Peter Parker was literally erased out of existence. I wanna see FFH deal with that, even just a little bit. He’s gotta have some sort of PTSD from that and Titan in general. I want to see him trying to deal with that while attempting to have a normal life again.

Give me Peter waking up from a nightmare about Titan. Give me Peter stiffening when someone mentions Footloose or dancing. Give me Peter closing his eyes and taking a deep breath to calm himself when the Snap gets brought up.

I wanna see my boy dealing with and recovering from what he’s been through, please and thank you

Listen,,,, I know Far From Home is supposed to be a feel-good movie after whatever the hell Endgame will bring, but Peter Parker was literally erased out of existence. I wanna see FFH deal with that, even just a little bit. He’s gotta have some sort of PTSD from that and Titan in general. I want to see him trying to deal with that while attempting to have a normal life again.

Give me Peter waking up from a nightmare about Titan. Give me Peter stiffening when someone mentions Footloose or dancing. Give me Peter closing his eyes and taking a deep breath to calm himself when the Snap gets brought up.

I wanna see my boy dealing with and recovering from what he’s been through, please and thank you

summary: The Highs & Lows of 'Captain Marvel'
title: The Highs & Lows of 'Captain Marvel'
body:
The long awaited arrival of #CaptainMarvel is here! Find out whether or not we thought the movie fly’s high or crash lands in our latest Highs and Lows!

Well it is finally here! The long awaited debut of Brie Larson as Carol Danvers aka. Captain Marvel! A lot have fans have been anxiously waiting for this movie ever since the announcement by Marvel at Comic Con that Brie Larson would be taking on the role as one of the most powerful characters to ever grace the pages of Marvel Comics as well as the silver screen in the MCU. Not only did we get…

summary: Details on New Avengers: Endgame Footage Reveal Captain Marvel and Thor Meeting
title: Details on New Avengers: Endgame Footage Reveal Captain Marvel and Thor Meeting
body:
Details on New Avengers: Endgame Footage Reveal Captain Marvel and Thor Meeting

Disney and Marvel Studios released new footage for Avengers: Endgame at their investor meeting on Thursday, which included Thor meeting Captain Marvel for the first time.

Twitter user Scott Ladewig, who claims he was at the investor meeting, provided the details.

The Avengers Endgame scene they showed was at Avengers HQ, Captain Marvel saying let’s go kill Tanos. Nebula says she knows where he…

tags: like I know it’s a super tense time but i was DYING
summary: CM end credit scene spoiler
title: CM end credit scene spoiler
body:
the funniest thing abt the Avengers end scene was they were all confused about what the pager was like “I want to know what this THING is!” 

Even Bruce and Rhodey who probably lived relatively normal lives back in the 90s and would have used a pager were so on edge about it and I was just cracking up so hard

summary: Captain Marvel filminde Türk besteci Pınar Toprak!
title: Captain Marvel filminde Türk besteci Pınar Toprak!
body:
Marvel Sinematik Evreni yapımlarında yer alan ilk kadın besteci Pınar Toprak oldu.

Türkiye‘de doğan ve 17 yaşında Amerika‘ya giden Pınar Toprak, Marvel Sinematik Evreni yapımlarında yer alan ilk kadın besteci oldu. Instagram üzerinden yaptığı paylaşımda “Benim için Marvel Sinematik Evreni‘nde yer almak inanılmaz bir onur. ” diyor ve ekliyor “Onlarca düşünce beynime saldırıyor. Bunlardan birisi de minnettarlık.”

Daha önce büyük çizgi roman firmalarının uyarlamalarında da görev…

summary:
Thor, picking up a snake: you remind me of my brother
Snake: (hisses) 
Thor: you seriously remind me of my brother, quite a bit...
body:
Thor, picking up a snake: you remind me of my brother


Snake: (hisses)


Thor: you seriously remind me of my brother, quite a bit actually


Snake: that’s becau-


Thor, setting down the snake: i hope you see many great battles my friend


Snake, as thor leaves: …wh… thor. Thor!


Loki, reappearing as himself: tis me!


Thor, surprised: by odin! And I just saw a snake so similar to you!


Loki:

Loki:

Loki: i was the snake


Thor: what?!


Loki: Thor I was the snake


Thor: you were??


Loki: thor, are you serious?


Thor: this is incredible


Loki, on the verge of tears in frustration: thor you are so incredibly stupid

body: Nick Fury naming it the “Avengers Initiative” after Carol is to remind everyone that they would have been nothing without her. I said it.

Fluffy-Wolfe's official art blog! Just an artsy fartsy college student showing art for others to enjoy!
If you need help finding things, check out the "Links" tab.
(Icon is by my twin sis @dijadean!)
DO NOT STEAL/REPOST MY ART PLEASE AND THANK YOU

summary: I saw Captain MArvel last night and IT WAS SOOO AMAZING!! So I figured I’d draw a little sequel to my last Captain Marvel piece...
caption:
I saw Captain MArvel last night and IT WAS SOOO AMAZING!! So I figured I’d draw a little sequel to my last Captain Marvel piece from last year. This time she’s ready for action! (Happy International Women’s Day!)

(Please consider reblogging!)

(Twitter) (Instagram)

summary: FYI
body:
FYI

I will NOT post any gifs or content from Captain Marvel or Endgame until TWO WEEKS after release. At that point I feel it’s fair to start posting again.

Trailers and their content will be posted. All else will not be.
